balls:Baal.NAME: Baal
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. All elites become burning elites.

balls:BallOfYarn.NAME: Ball of Yarn
DESCRIPTIONS: On receiving a fatal blow, this relic instead negates the damage. You may do this #b3 times.

balls:Baseball.NAME: Baseball
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
strength at the start of combat. Whenever you deal the exact amount of damage required to kill an enemy, permanently increase this value by #b1.

balls:Basketball.NAME: Basketball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play cards of the same type back-to-back, gain #b1 block.

balls:BeachBall.NAME: Beach Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 dexterity at the start of combat. Every turn, you must play a power, or lose that #b2 dexterity.

balls:BowlingBall.NAME: Bowling Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill every enemy in a fight at the same time, gain [E] at the start of next combat.

balls:CheeseBall.NAME: Cheese Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you heal HP, heal 2 extra HP.

balls:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: See a preview of the next combat when hovering over the nodes on the map.

balls:DiscoBall.NAME: Disco Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you choose to skip a card reward, you are able to navigate freely to the next floor.

balls:Dodgeball.NAME: Dodgeball
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the first time you would lose HP each combat. Wears off on your second turn.

balls:EightBall.NAME: Eight Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: See a preview of the next event when hovering over the nodes on the map.

balls:EnergyBall.NAME: Energy Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]act.[] Right-click to gain [E]

balls:Football.NAME: Football
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You may only spend #b1 minute on any given turn.

balls:Fudgeball.NAME: Fudge Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, regain all HP and gain #b20 max hp. Whenever you encounter another food relic, regain all your HP upon picking it up. Lee's Waffle grants #b15 max HP on pickup. Gain an extra #b1 max HP per floor. Negates the effects of Mark of the Bloom.

balls:GolfBall.NAME: Golf Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain gold at the end of combat based on how quickly you finish. Par is the act number. NL Hole In One: #b25 gold. NL Eagle: #b20 gold. NL Birdie: #b15 gold. NL Par: #b10 gold. NL Bogey: #b5 gold.

balls:Handball.NAME: Handball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack an enemy, deal #b2 damage to a random monster.

balls:Kickball.NAME: Kickball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy attacks you for less than #b10 damage, deal #b10 damage back to them.

balls:Marble.NAME: Marble
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]combat.[] Right-click to apply #b1 vulnerable to a random enemy.

balls:MedicineBall.NAME: Medicine Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you rest at a campfire, you may lift this relic up to #b3 times and gain strength at the start of combat. Whenever you lift with Girya, restore #b15% of your max HP.

balls:PachinkoBall.NAME: Pachinko Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: For your first #b5 turns, if you finish your turn in #b15 seconds, gain #b5 gold.

balls:PaddleBall.NAME: Paddle Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack each combat is reflection back onto a random enemy.

balls:Pinball.NAME: Pinball
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you attack an enemy consecutively, increase the damage dealt by #b2.

balls:PingPongBall.NAME: Ping Pong Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you alternate attacks between different enemies, increase the damage dealt by #b2.

balls:Pokeball.NAME: Pokeball
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of every other combat, add #b25 gold, a potion, or a card reward to the rewards.

balls:Riceball.NAME: Riceball
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase max HP by #b12.

balls:RubberBandBall.NAME: Rubber Band Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]only [#2aecd7]once.[] Every turn, increase the counter by 1. Right-click to unleash it's fury, dealing #b5 times the counter as damage to all enemies.

balls:RubberBouncyBall.NAME: Rubber Bouncy Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]turn.[] Right-click to deal #b2 damage to a random enemy.

balls:Snowball.NAME: Snowball
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b3 attacks played, channel #1 frost orb.

balls:TeninsBall.NAME: Tennis Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]only [#2aecd7]once.[] At the start of combat, increase the counter by #b1. Right-click to gain block equal to the counter.

balls:Volleyball.NAME: Volleyball
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you alternate between playing attacks and skills, gain #b2 block.

balls:WaterPoloBall.NAME: Water Polo Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]combat.[] Right-click to enter Calm. If you are already in Calm, enter Wrath.

balls:WhiffleBall.NAME: WhiffleBall
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b4 cards you play, draw #b1 card and discard #b1 card.

balls:WreckingBall.NAME: Wrecking Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, deal between #b5 and #b10 damage to each enemy.
